tools.name: AB Method
tools.description: Simple command to add AB method workflow to Claude Code
tools.author: ayoubben18

steps.content:
Run this command in your terminal to install the AB Method workflow:

```bash
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ayoubben18/ab-method/refs/heads/main/install.sh | bash
```

This will automatically set up the AB Method in your `.claude` directory.
